author: Lon.TV
description:
Buy one on Amazon: https://lon.tv/obd2a (compensated affiliate link) - DJI recently updated their popular DJI Mic product for phones, cameras and computers. Here's what it's like to use from the perspective of a general consumer. See more production : https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLCZHp4d1HnIvvVOzAg3BFV34vVmIhs8OJ and subscribe! http://lon.tv/s

00:00 - Intro

01:24 - Quad Mic Support

02:41 - Battery life and charging case
03:38 - Receiver Overview
04:52 - Transmitter Overview
07:09 - Audio Sample In Studio
08:13 - Noisy trade show floor

10:33 - Windscreens
10:53 - App Settings

title: DJI Mic 3 Review - DJI's Turn-Key Clip On Mic for Phones, Cameras, and Computers
